      • Tower

        public Tower(java.lang.String name,
             int towerCost,
             int range,
             int damage,
             int delay,
             int x,
             int y,
             int scaleSize)
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the tower
        towerCost - cost of placing the tower
        range - the distance the tower can shoot
        damage - the amount of damage the tower does
        delay - how fast the tower shoots in seconds
        row - the position of the tower's top left position on the map
        col - the position of the tower's top left position on the map

      • activateTower

        public abstract Enemy activateTower(Enemy curEnemy)
        The enemy passed into this method will be modified with any damage taken or any other effects a tower can have on the enemy itself
        Parameters:
        curEnemy - current Enemy that is being target by the tower
        Returns:
        modified version of curEnemy
